author: gstein
msg: Add a check to the command line for the case where a user passes a
filename to the "-m" switch, when they wanted "-F" instead.
* clients/cmdline/main.c (main): when -m is provided, stat() the thing
to see if it is a file. after arg processing, then check if the
flag was set and '--force' wasn't provided.
